name: The Dragon Hunting Swordsman (Skill Card)
skill_activation: At the start of the Duel, flip this card over.
skill_effect:
Once per Duel, you can discard 1 card, then Fusion Summon 1 Fusion Monster that mentions "Buster Blader", using monsters from your hand or field as material.
While the only monster you control is "Buster Blader" or a Fusion Monster that mentions it, monsters in your opponent's GY become Dragons.
